getIncludedScript

public java.lang.String getIncludedScript(java.lang.String srcAttribute)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
Returns the contents of an included script, given its src attribute.

Parameters:
srcAttribute - the relative URL for the included script
Returns:
the contents of the script.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is a problem retrieving the script
